document_data.name: Zillak
document_data.mainbody: '''Zillak''' was a member of [[House Baenre]] and an assassin in the service of the [[Archmage of Menzoberranzan]] [[Gromph Baenre]] in [[1373 DR]].
document_data.History: Zillak was one of Gromph's most trusted agents. During the [[Siege of Menzoberranzan]], his master, after being blinded in a fight with [[Nimor Imphraezl]], requested the assistance of Zillak and the [[wizard]] [[Jaemas Xorlarrin]] to perform an eye transplant from a prisoner who was a member of [[House Agrach Dyrr]].
